artifact_consistency.summary: Artifacts are present and self-consistent at a structural level. The execution schedule references ATU stubs defined in the execution plan; the roadmap and unblock plan map to the same UNBLOCK-* action IDs.

global_blockers: Missing product-level schema files for mapped products
Template-only rule registry entries lacking severity and remediation metadata
Missing per-product evaluator adapters or mappings to pipeline executor
Orphan rule_specs require ownership and reconciliation

vector: base rule templates missing severity and remediation_hint
compute: base rule templates missing severity and remediation_hint
pipeline: base rule templates missing severity and remediation_hint
pipeline executor present but adapters required

notes: All requested Phase-3 planning artifacts are present under `ai_reports/`.
The primary reason for BLOCKED readiness is missing product schemas, template-only rule definitions, and missing evaluator adapters.
Artifacts are intentionally calendar-agnostic and dependency-driven; they are ready to drive PRs and implementation work once blockers are addressed.
Recommended immediate actions: promote schemas for one product as a pilot, implement canonical adapter scaffolding, and complete one concrete rule to validate the end-to-end flow.
